definitions.definition: A member of a supposed prehistoric race that lived in caves or holes , a caveman .

examples: The cave was populated by albino scorpions, blind salamanders, and other troglodytes .

definitions.definition: A reclusive , reactionary or out-of-date person , especially if brutish .
A person who chooses not to keep up to date with the latest software and hardware .

main_definition: A member of a supposed prehistoric race that lived in caves or holes , a caveman .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Anything that lives underground .
( derogatory ) A reclusive , reactionary or out-of-date person , especially if brutish .
( computing ) A person who chooses not to keep up to date with the latest software and hardware .
